title: Lalpan min hmangaihna chu
lyrics:
Lalpan min hmangaihna chu,
Van rangkachak ram kalsanin,
Sual fate min zawng turin,
A tuar Lalpa Isuan.

Lungngaihna thing kraws chu ka tan a pu a,
Chauvin a tlu a;
Kilhna thir khen ka tan a na lua e,
Aw, ka sawi thei lo.

Chenna ngai loh ram fan chu,
Kawr sen leh hling phiar chu khumin,
Hrehawm tinreng tuar zovin,
Beramno, Lal Isua.

Thlir ninawm lo, Lal Isua,
Mi sual tana kraws chu puin,
Kalvari lam pan turin,
A chau a ni, ka Lal.

Aw, ka tana zovin,
Kalvari tlang thing kraws chungah,
Ka sual zawng zawng phur chungin,
Min tlan ta, Lal Isuan.
